page.title: 11HOLY FAMILY R.C. E.SWINDON
page.content: Our school is a mixed Catholic school. All the pupils except one are{baptised {catholics}.The school was opened in January 1964 and was also used as a church until Holy Family Church was built.There are eight classes at the moment a total of children whose ages range from 7 to 11 years.There are several different nationalities, including{Polish,Irish,Italian}and {French}.The children usually come here from the Holy Family Infants school.There is a playground and a playing field which has a jumping pit, running track and football pitch.We also play netball,rounders and cricket.We can play percussion instruments or the violin or join the choir.We have one{television}and one {computer}.Some of the children come to school on one of the two school buses but most of them walk.
